title: Your best

replies.body:
Best pickup line is to stare at them with binoculars.

Wait, no it's not.
Creative/funny pickup lines are the best. Cheesy ones make me uncomfortable and want to die. Also if I've heard of it before.

That's sounds like your a chick xD
Don't answer that btw, it's my opinion, cause your sentence (to me) looks like from a girls perspective :P
